descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4] IN V1.20 I forgot to change weight, armor rating and value of light armor version (they were the same like heavy version), so please download Golden Armory Fix. [/size][/b]

[b][size=4] Requirements [/size][/b]
Only Skyrim, no DLC is required.

[b][size=4] Mod Description [/size][/b]
Adds golden armors & weapons:
[list]
[*]Golden Armor (Light & heavy version)
[*]Golden Boots (Light & heavy version)
[*]Golden Helmet (Light & heavy version)
[*]Golden Gauntlets (Light & heavy version)
[*]Golden Shield (Light & heavy version)
[*]Golden Arrows
[*]Golden Battle Axe
[*]Golden Bow
[*]Golden Dagger
[*]Golden Greatsword
[*]Golden Mace
[*]Golden Scimitar
[*]Golden Spear
[*]Golden Sword
[*]Golden War Axe
[*]Golden Warhammer
[*]Golden Katana (1-handed)
[*]Golden Dai-katana (2-handed)
[/list] You can create them at any forge.

[b][size=4] Installation [/size][/b]
Extract "Data" folder into your "Skyrim" folder.

[b][size=4] Uninstallation [/size][/b]
Remove all files you previously installed.

[b][size=4] Known bugs [/size][/b]
[list]
[*]none
[/list] If you find any, report them to me.

[b][size=4] Changelog [/size][/b]
1.20
[list]
[*]changed Golden Armor texture
[*]added light version of armor
[*]added Golden Katana & Golden Dai-katana
[*]fixed some bugs
[/list]
1.10
[list]
[*]changed every texture
[*]changed amount of gold and ebony needed for smithing
[/list]
1.00
[list]
[*]release
[/list]
[b][size=4] Credits [/size][/b]
[list]
[*]Bethesda Game Studios: for making Skyrim & Creation Kit
[*]AssasinsDash: for testing my mod
[/list]
This is my 1st mod and my native language isn't english.
[b][size=4] !DO NOT REUPLOAD OR MODIFY THIS MOD WITHOUT MY PERMISSION![/size][/b]
author: adrian4499
